comments.text:
Set your start page to about:memory

click on the more verbose link, I'm offered a file picker to open a jar file instead of seeing more information.

comments.creator: standard8@mozilla.com
comments.author: standard8@mozilla.com
comments.text:
(In reply to comment #5)
> Not a Thunderbird bug... CCing njn

What makes you think this? (It WFM in FF 6).

If this is a specific Thunderbird bug, then basically we don't allow links to work in the start page, so anything about:* will be broken, and using a tool like View:About is the more appropriate thing to do.
comments.raw_text:
(In reply to comment #5)
> Not a Thunderbird bug... CCing njn

What makes you think this? (It WFM in FF 6).

If this is a specific Thunderbird bug, then basically we don't allow links to work in the start page, so anything about:* will be broken, and using a tool like View:About is the more appropriate thing to do.
